org.apereo.cas.authentication

接口 ContextualAuthenticationPolicy<T>

  • 所有超级接口:
    AuthenticationPolicy, org.springframework.core.Ordered

    public interface ContextualAuthenticationPolicy<T>
extends AuthenticationPolicy
    A stateful authentication policy that is applied using arbitrary contextual information.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.0.0

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.springframework.core.Ordered

        HIGHEST_PRECEDENCE, LOWEST_PRECEDENCE

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getCode()
      Return an optional message code to use when this ContextualAuthenticationPolicy is unsatisfied.
      T getContext()
      Gets the context used to evaluate the authentication policy.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apereo.cas.authentication.AuthenticationPolicy

        getOrder, isSatisfiedBy

    • 方法详细资料

      • getContext

        T getContext()
        Gets the context used to evaluate the authentication policy.
        返回:
        Context information.

      • getCode

        default java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getCode()
        Return an optional message code to use when this ContextualAuthenticationPolicy is unsatisfied.
        返回:
        Optional message code
